name: radish34-deploy
description: One time job for deploying Radish34 smart contracts

scripts.deploy-dev: RPC_PROVIDER=http://localhost:8545 KEYSTORE_PATH=./../config/keystore CONTRACTS_PATH=./paths-contracts-dev.json ORGANISATION_CONFIG_PATH=./../config MESSENGER_BUYER_URI=http://localhost:4001 MESSENGER_SUPPLIER1_URI=http://localhost:4002 MESSENGER_SUPPLIER2_URI=http://localhost:4003 ZKP_URL=http://localhost:8080 node ./src/deploy.js
